reviews.text: You can tell that the music is going to be good by the music that's playing.
Always great food. My go-to lunch spot.

Chris Deli is always amazing!!!
The food is delicious, the price is budget friendly, the establishment is always clean & safe, the staff is the BEST EVER!!! It's our goto on a weekly basis.
WE'RE NEVER DISAPPOINTED!
I ordered a ham and Swiss sandwich on a roll. My sandwich had 2 slices of ham on it. Pathetic! Never again! I wish I could attach the picture of this pathetic sandwich.
First time eating here food was ok the meat was a bit salty and the price after weighing it was crazy I don‚Äôt think I will return here to eat again
terrific!!

I just moved to the area. I have tried all the restaurants surrounding for breakfast. I walk past 4 shops to go to Chris‚Äôs. The service is always on point. The vibe is always positive. The coffee and the breakfast is just the icing on the cake. If you are ever in the area and want some good food and positive vibes check this place out
I eat from here almost every day. The owners are so nice. The food is delicious! They also cater.
It's an amazing place .I eat there all the time. food is fresh people are friendly.
I have had food catered several times and they never disappoint. They have excellent customer service. I look forward to ordering again real soon.

This place has some of the best food I've ever eaten.

The best mac and cheese I've ever had in my entire life.

Previous to eating here my favorite mac and cheese was from Amy Ruth's in Harlem, and the mac and cheese here is better by A LOT.

The pernil is the best I've ever had that wasn't cooked by a relative, and I'm Dominican and Puerto Rican so I know my pernil.

The produce is super fresh, very fresh tasting salad, fruit, and veggies.

I am a HUGE fan. I plan to come back regularly for the mac and cheese and pernil especially.

And it's very sanitary, they require you to wear gloves when serving yourself from their buffet, which is a move very few businesses make,  and I greatly appreciate.

I'd also like to note that I'm a very picky eater and have very high standards for food quality, because I was raised by a fantastic chef. I am very rarely so excited by eateries, even the very well reviewed ones, I'm often dissapointed and left wanting.

If you're in the area, stop over for a very well priced meal, especially for the quality.

It's a locally owned small business with good service and fantastic food, sanitary, fresh, good prices, there's nothing more you could ask for.

I would reccomend it to literally anyone.

One of the best food spots in the area. I go all the time and the food is always excellent!! Pernil is my fav. Excellent people running the place and just a high quality establishment with community values
Fantastic!!!!
Amazing food!
We eat here in the regular for breakfast and lunch. The food is amazing and everyone working the is really great. Highly recommend.

Delicious food.
I went around 2 pm. I got the baked Mac and cheese, rice with gandules, chicken and ribs. The chicken had a little spice to it; just right. The ribs, I got the scraps but still good with potential to have good pieces on top. Delicious over all.
Great food and service üëå
Wonderful
Love the food and great people

Very clean, they follow covid protocol must sanitize hands and wear gloves and mask before going into buffet area.
Food is delicious and employees are polite.
Establishment is clean, food is authentic spanish delicious food and their coffee is so good too.
They make great sandwiches. I also like the food they sell.

Delicious food and delightful staff. They have taken measures to ensure ones safety during the pandemic. They require ALL customers to use gloves (they provide) in order to grab yourself your food. They are top in quality of food and top in customer care!

This place is amazing to say the least! Just celebrated my daughter's 1st bday party and entrusted Chris Super Deli with the catering and I couldn't have asked for a better experience. The Customer service was great, the price was awesome,‚Ä¶

All I can say is Chris super deli is where it‚Äôs at. They have delicious food, great prices, and the CATER!!! They are my go to for all me events, you definitely will not be disappointed. You can take that to the bank
Always the best...everything here is good Nima and family the absolute best
A friendly staff, mostly fresh food, made to order. I've been buying food from here for 20 years and never had a problem.
Love the food, love the owners.
Best Dominican Buffet. Love it üíØ‚Ä¶
Very good spanish food!
This place is great. Friendly customer service and the food is great. Love this place

Amazing food every day. I go there for breakfast, lunch. The food is always good, super friendly staff and coffee is the best, no question about it. There are so many dishes in there that are good. Go look and try, you will see and taste the best Spanish food around. Update: everything is good. Try a little bit of everything.
Food is excellent and so is the customer service!
This place is one word ‚ÄúAmazing‚Äù. The food is delicious and has the best Coffee I ever tasted. The staff are so welcoming and great, I cannot say enough how great this place is.
Best latino food, self serve I've been to. Glad I found this place, try the Angus beef meat balls and the pernil, sausages are op. Good for keto diet and low carb.
Not only the food is delicious, your contribution to programs within the community is valuable and appreciated.
Love the food here.
Awesome Mac n cheese!!! And I don't even like mac n cheese! ‚ù§Ô∏è Spanish rice with lentils.
Great food, awesome prices... Catering is reasonable.
Food looks Great, and The Young Lady Behind the counter is Gorgeous!
